title: 5 Pack Drawer Pulls Cabinet Handles, Space-Saving Handles for Drawer Cabinet Dresser, Length 4.2", Screw Hole Spacing 3.8" (Dark Gray)
description: Set of 5 zinc alloy drawer pulls, each with 2 screws. Dimensions: 106mm (4.2") length, 37mm (1.5") width, 96mm (3.8") screw hole spacing, 5mm (0.2") thickness. Screws: 16mm (0.6") length, 6.5mm (0.25") head diameter. Space-saving design; pulls drop flush when not in use and lift to 180°. Easy installation. Suitable for drawers, cabinets, and more
